comments.text:
Created attachment 524203
mochitest for this bug

If you focus, for example, a button, and you check caretOffset of its text interface (not with DOMi nor accerciser, as window needs to be active to return caret), it is set after the last character. Is should be -1
comments.author: fherrera@onirica.com
comments.raw_text: If you focus, for example, a button, and you check caretOffset of its text interface (not with DOMi nor accerciser, as window needs to be active to return caret), it is set after the last character. Is should be -1
comments.creator: fherrera@onirica.com

comments.text: *** Bug 646785 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: fherrera@onirica.com
comments.creator: fherrera@onirica.com

comments.author: fherrera@onirica.com
comments.text: Notice that firefox 3.6 is still reporting a caret position in this situation, but at 0 instead of at characterCount
comments.raw_text: Notice that firefox 3.6 is still reporting a caret position in this situation, but at 0 instead of at characterCount
